title: Path planning and Collision avoidance
description: Implemented motion planning for crowds of agents to navigate a map with obstacles in > 40 fps.
Experimented with A-star, 3D RRT for planning and time-to-collision, boids for collision avoidance.

title: Physics-based game animations
description: Built realistic looking cloth using a grid of nodes acted on by spring forces, gravity and air drag.
Built 2D water waves using a grid of water columns acted on by forces from shallow water equations.
Wrote our own vector math library, and implemented numerical integrations to render at > 30 fps.

title: Replicated Bank Server Application
description: Created a group of server processes performing total-ordered operations, just using Lamport clocks.
Many distributed multithreaded clients can all only see a consistent state machine model.

title: Distributed Hash Table
description: Built a dictionary storage server using the Chord P2P protocol using Java RMI for communication.

title: Machine Learning algorithms
description: Implemented Logistic Regression, Naive Bayes, SVM, Neural Networks, CNNs, Random Forests.
Compared de-biasing methods using fairness metrics like demographic parity and equal opportunity.

title: AI Agent to play Super Mario
description: Implemented Deep Q-learning and Actor-Critic models to learn the game using reinforcement learning.
Successfully completed the first level of the game with 4 hours of training.
